page.title: 07QUESTIONARE
page.content:
A SAMPLE OF 100 PUPILS LIVING IN OUR GRID AREA WERE ASKED THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ABOUT THEIR HOMELIFE.
Q1 {HOW MANY PEOPLE LIVE IN YOUR HOME? Q2 {WHAT TYPE OF HOUSE IS IT?(SPECIFY) Q3 {HOW MANY ROOMS ARE THERE?} Q4{ HAVE YOU CENTRAL HEATING YES/NO Q5 {HAVE YOU ANY PETS? IF SO SPECIFY Q6{ WHAT TRANSPORT HAVE YOU WITHIN { YOUR HOME? } Q7{ HAVE YOU A COMPUTER? YES/NO Q8{ HAVE YOU A VIDEO? YES/NO Q9{ HAVE YOU A MICROWAVE OVEN? YES/NO Q10{DO YOU TAKE A DAILY NEWS PAPER?IF { YES,SPECIFY.
PLEASE REFER TO THE NEXT PAGE FOR THE RESULTS OF THIS QUESTIONNAIRE.
